title: Game keeps crashing after 6.18 update
body: so when i select a champion and load in the game crashes... any one no how to fix the issue. ALSO i got a new video card when this bug started happening pls help me.

replies.body: anyone have a fuc king solution, my lower priority que has reseted 4 times because of crash

I dare say a similar issue has arisen for me as well; since the patching.

I get through champ select, the load screen, and even manage to buy my starting items, then: the sound glitches, screen freezes, and I am left to hard reset. But, bug-splat does not pop-up, and after reformatting and re-installing find myself back with the same issue.
exactly the same thing, have you found a solution?

After champ select loading screen has loaded and we are in game my whole computer freezes and i have to force shutdown and reboot it again, has only happened since path 6.18, never had this problem before. Please help.

Still happening here too.
Lost games, and the ** afk queue because of a poor quality release.
Riot... pls:
(1) Fix the bug. Whatever you changed, its causing systems to crash. Its like you've rediscovered the FOOF bug... 
(2) Fix affected gamers AFK settings - I get why you have the barrier, but I'm being reported / autobusted as I have to hard boot my system due to this bug.

I am having issues in-game. Everything will be running fine and then randomly the game won't allow me to move. I can see my champion stuck and auto attacking but i cannot do anything. I have to close league and re-log on but it will continue to do this. I have tried repairing my client multiple times. I don't get any bugsplats or notifications as to why it continues to do this. Like i said, it is completely random when it occurs. Some games it is okay and others its a real problem. Just wondering if there is anything I can do?

PLEASE HELP RIOT. i have had the same issue. the game keeps crashing randomly throughout a game. the freeze is a complete stop on my computer where i cant even force quit. i have to restart my computer. please help. i cant play. you guys are hardworking on a great game thankyou by the way. i have a mac computer. has strictly dont it ever since 6.18 update.

I am experiencing the same issue as Mentos85. I'll get through champ select and buy my starting items, then the whole system crashes. I can't exit league or use my comp at all, have to hard reset. Very annoying since I've had 3 ranked games crash and now i have 3 losses and lower priority que time at 10 minutes.
It happened again, please help. I don't care about the IP. Could you just take off the low priority que time?

Same for me.

Starting the game - crashes as the first frame
Any time a 'victory/defeat' banner is to come up.
and at the afk warning (only 1 sample there - its not a habit)

When I say crash, the entire system is unresponsive. I have to hard power cycle to recover.

There is no 'bugsplat' or anything... It looks like some gpu operation is.. well.. not as improved as you would hope.

When you say crash, what are you seeing exactly?  Are there any error messages?  As a first step, make sure you're not using any third party add-ons like play.tv as it's known to cause crashes around this time.  Let meknow!

Exact same issue here. New GPU Msi 1060.
All I get is a bugsplat report and I tried all the bug splat fixes nothing is working and I can't play.
